metadata.dc:title: Incidence of microfractures produced by two types of ultrasonic tips in retrograde cavity preparation
metadata.dc:description: Objective: Thepurpuse of this study was to evaluate, in vitro, the performance of two kinds of ultrasonic tips, stainless steel and diamond ones, on retrocavities preparation. Materials and method: Nine single-rooted teeth were selected. The teeth were randomly divided into three experimental groups. Group 1: Control group, apicectomy only; group 2: retrocavities preparated with stainless steel tip; and group 3: retrocavities preparated with diamond tip. Retrocavities preparation were made with the ultrasonic device Suprasson P Max Lux. Satelec on the medium frequency setting. Microcracks were observed (examined) using a stereomicroscope. Results and conclusion: This study indicates that use of stainless steel ultrasonic tips result in significant root-en cracking when compared with diamond tips, on retrocavities preparation (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Oliveira, E
Barbero Navarro, I
Gabriela Bento, M
metadata.dc:description: Objetivo: Comparación, in vitro, de la incidencia de microfracturas provocadas por dos tipos de puntas ultrasónicas de acero inoxidable y diamantada en la preparación de retro-cavidades. Material y métodos: 90 dientes unirradiculares, instrumentados y obturados manualmente, divididos aleatoriamente en 3 grupos: grupo 1: grupo control, solo con apicectomia; grupo 2: Apicectomia y retrocavidad preparada con punta de acero inoxidable P14 (Satelec) y grupo 3: Apicectomia y retrocavidad preparada con punta diamantada P14D (Satelec). El sistema de ultrasonidos utilizado fue Suprasson P Max Lux, Satelec a frecuencia media. Las microfracturas fueron examinadas al microscopio esteroscópico de superficie. Resultados y conclusiones: Las puntas de acero inoxidable producen mas microfracturas que las diamantadas, en la preparación de retrocavidades (AU)
metadata.dc:title: Incidencia de microfracturas producidas por dos tipos de puntas ultrasónicas en la preparación de cavidades retrógradas
